reviews.comments: 1000 puntos Alejandra, super dispuesta y comprensiva.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por todo, Germán! Saludos

reviews.comments: La anfitriona, muy buena, hermoso el looft,  muy cumplidora con la entrega y el estado del dpto.
reviews.response: Gracias a vos, Silvia! Espero que la próxima vez puedas venir. Un saludo

reviews.comments: Es la segunda vez que me hospedo en el loft. Simplemente me hace sentir en mi casa el lugar. Ale siempre con su buena predisposicion.

La verdad que me sentí como en mi casa,me encanto el loft,un espacio amplio y tranquilo. Muy cálido. Alejandra,divina,si bien es su casa,desde el primer momento te hace sentir cómodo y como si fuera tu propio hogar. Lo volvería a elegir.

El lugar es muy agradable, el departamento está muy seguro, está limpio, y tal cual como aparece en las fotografías, el barrio de San Telmo es muy agradable, hay mucho que ver y qué hacer!
Recomendable estancia y la atención de Alejandra excelente!
Genial todo, ambiente arquitectónicamente elegante y con estilo , Alejandra muy cordial y buena onda, muchas gracias por todo :)
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por todo, Juan! Para mí ha sido un gusto recibirlos. Hasta pronto espero! ;-)

reviews.comments:
Excelente espacio para vivir Buenos Aires como un habitante más de la ciudad. Se encuentra muy bien ubicado, con excelente conectividad a los distintos puntos de la ciudad. 
Alejandra es una persona muy amable y preocupada, siempre dispuesta a brindar el apoyo que se requiera.
Totalmente recomendable.

El apartamento de Alejandra es hermoso y sumamente acogedor, muy bien ubicado para caminar hacia San Telmo o hacia Puerto Madero. Ella nos recibió muy amablemente y estuvo disponible para cualquier necesidad durante toda nuestra estadía. Muy recomendable!

Excelente departamento, equipado pensando en cada detalle o necesidad que pueda  tener el  inquilino , durante nuestra estadía de 10 días no tuvimos necesidad de contactar a Alejandra después de su cordial recepción, pues todas y cada una de nuestras necesidades estaban cubiertas , Alejandra ha organizado todo de tal manera que usted tenga todo a la mano y se sienta como en casa, y en caso de necesitar su asistencia ella estará allí para colaborarle, la ubicación del departamento es muy estratégica para el movimiento alrededor de la ciudad , ya que se encuentra muy cerca de las lineas de colectivos y pues a quienes les guste caminar la ciudad también esta muy accesible, el barrio  de San Telmo cuenta con toda clase de comodidades y sitios interesantes para ver y disfrutar. Ha sido una buena experiencia llegar a este departamento.

Muy buena comunicación con Alejandra, buena onda.
La casa encantadora y el barrio tipico y a su vez practico para moverse.
reviews.response: Un abrazo, José, espero conocerte una próxima vez! :-)

reviews.comments:
Descripción del apartamento se correspondía con lo que encontramos. Aunque el Paseo de Colón es una avenida con tráfico, no se nota nada porque el apartamento no da a la calle directamente , lo que se agradece mucho. Es tranquilo y está muy bien ubicado
Nos encantó que Alejandra nos dejara café y algo para comer. Todo un detalle.
Excelente loft, centrico en San telmo, gran conectividad. recomendable totalmente!!!

Una gran anfitriona. Aunque llegamos tarde por el vuelo, ella estuvo disponible para recibirnos y darnos la bienvenida. El departamento está idéntico a las fotos; muy cerca de Puerto Madero y a dos cuadras de la Plaza Dorrego (siempre divertida y con mucha vida). Excelente ubicación

El loft es muy confortable, luminoso, bien protegido del ruido y en muy buena ubicación. Un lugar que asegura una estancia agradable. Alejandra nos recibió y explicó lo necesario de manera amable y detallada. Una gran anfitriona. Muy recomendable.

Alejandra es una excelente anfitriona!
Por problemas de tráfico, llegamos 2 horas más tarde de lo conversado, pero ella tuvo la mejor disposición y nos recibió de manera muy cariñosa y amable. Nos entregó todo lo necesario para nuestra estancia y estuvo atenta a cualquier duda o consulta que tuviésemos. 
¿Qué podría decir del loft? igual de increíble como se ve en las fotos!! Nos encantó!! Además los vecinos son muy amables y el edificio es muy tranquilo. 
Todo estuvo perfecto! Si vuelvo a Bs As no dudaré en volver a contactarme contigo Alejandra....gracias por todo!! Besos
reviews.response: Bárbara, para mí fue un gusto conocerlas! La próxima nos tomamos unos mates para seguir la charla. Un abrazo!!!!

reviews.comments: La descripción era correcta, tal como en las fotos. Nos tocó lluvia pero el loft era acogedor y de temperatura muy agradable. Lo pasamos excelente. Alejandra siempre estuvo disponible para cualquier cosa y nos dio una cálida bienvenida, aun cuando al momento de check in estaba jugando la selección argentina!
Departamento súper cómodo y acogedor! Mejor ubicado imposible!

I realized Alejandra is a great host since the very first message she wrote on airb&b. She always answers quickly and she is a very kind and warm person. We arrived earlier than what was planned, and I don't know how she intuitively knew it and called us offering to meet us earlier.

The place is really well located, it's ample, well decorated, and it's a great place to arrive to after being all day out. We had a problem with the elevator as we arrived, but Alejandra helped us with the heavier luggage. During the rest of our stay it worked properly. Couch and single bed were not that comfortable, but that's not a problem if it is only two of you travelling together, since there's a super comfy king size bed upstairs.

Will definitely go to her loft again, and of course I have already recommended to my friends.
The location is great
Lugar incrível em um bairro muito bom. Perto de tudo, estiloso, limpo, claro... Sou apenas elogios ao apartamento e a anfitriã que foi incrível.
Apartamento confortável e anfitriã super simpática! Ótima opção ficar em San Telmo!

Die Unterkunft ist perfekt gelegen im aufstrebenden San Telmo Viertel. Die Loft ist hip eingerichtet und entspricht genau den Bildern. Wir waren nur zu zweit, haben den Raum aber sehr genossen und uns auch mal am Nachmittag zum ausruhen zurückgezogen. Alejandra hat immer sehr schnell gesntwortet und war eine sehr hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Alles in allem sehr zu empfehelen & jederzeit gerne wieder , Sarah

My husband and I had a great stay in this apartment. Alejandra was very flexible with check in, even after we were delayed over an hour. The apartment had a very cool, fun layout. We had every amenity we needed and were able to walk everywhere in San Telmo. I highly recommend this apartment.
Overall a good stay!

We stayed for a week in San Telmo and the flat was absolutely adorable. For a family with one child it was perfect (otherwise it would have been a bit small), and the location is ideal to visit San Telmo, el Caminito and round Puerto Madero. We loved the area, bohemian chic, with a great market, the feria verde twice a week (unsweetened yogurt !), lovely shops and the museum of modern art around the corner. There is a direct bus to the area of Recoleta as well, so it's great place to visit Buenos Aires.
The flat is vintage and lovingly decorated, which is great. However, the pots and pans have seen better days (about ten years ago) so this and the rusty cutlery could do with an upgrade.
Alejandra showed us the ropes on arrival and we had a very good communication with her whenever we had a question, she was very helpful providing suggestions and tips.
reviews.response: Dear Emmanuelle, thank you for your review, I take note of your suggestions. By the way, the pots and pans are not so old, unfortunately they don't take care of them properly. Anyway, I will buy new ones soon. Thanks again and I feel happy you have enjoyed San Telmo. Kind regards.

reviews.comments: L'appartement d'Alejandra est très bien situé. Il plaira aux voyageurs qui aiment les endroits peu conventionnels et les objets Années 50 que collectionne sa propriétaire. Il est bien équipé et silencieux, mais pas très lumineux et particulièrement "vintage".  Alejandra est attentive et communicative.

Appartement sympa et bien placé. Agencement original et sympathique !
Alejandra a été très souple au niveau des horaires de check in et check out. 
Beaucoup de place dans l'appartement, nous étions 5 sans soucis. 
Restaurant et épicerie très proche ! 
Seul petit bémol, salle de bain veillote  mais ça n'empêche pas un très bon séjour !
Je recommande

Me and my family stayed at the loft for five nights and it was a wonderful experience!!! The apartment is fantastic, clean and with everything you need. The area is fantastic and it is very easy and safe to walk around both in the city and on the habour side. Alejandra is a fantastic host, communication was excellent and included guidelines, check-in and out was very easy. We can definitely recommend to stay here and would love to come back.
Definitely quirky, all the creature comforts you could want, San Telmo is so much fun, lets face it so is Buenos Aires. I think I've made a friend in Alejandra.
reviews.response: Thank you, Bryne and Ritchie! It was a pleasure to host you and looking forward to seeing you again!

reviews.comments:
Très bon accueil, emplacement parfait, proche de tout (café, restaurants, musée, ligne de bus et de métro...)
Super accueil plein de petites attentions.
C'était vraiment très agréable de pouvoir compter sur la gentillesse de cette hôte.
Je recommande sans hésitation !

Alejandra's place was lovely. Exactly as it is described and looks in the pictures. She was readily available when we had any questions and thoroughly provided instructions and help prior arrival. Great place in one of my favourite locations in BA!

Alejandra ist eine sehr nette und unkomplizierte Gastgeberin. Sie war sehr hilfsbereit.
Die Wohnung ist super gelegen, in nur wenigen Minuten zu Fuss ist man mitten in San Telmo. Die Wohnung ist sehr gut ausgestattet und recht gross. Wir fühlten uns wirklich wie zuhause! Empfehlenswert!

Great location for discovering this wonderful part of the city. Very easy to get around, and if you like walking there are so many little sidestreets to discover. 
The loft has everything required to enjoy your stay in the city. Nice and clean and Alejandra answered any questions very promptly.

The market bursts to life with music, dancing and artisans. Don't miss it on Sundaywhen its at its peak!

We were very happy to stay at Alejandras appartement. It has everything you need, it is clean and has a very nice and special style.
The location was perfect for us, as we were spending a lot of our time walking around in san telmo.
Alejandra is a very welcoming and uncomplicated host!
We would definately stay here again!!

Alejandra's apartment is a great place to stay. It is really clean and picturesque. Even though it is on a main street it is not noisy at all because it is at the back of the building. It is central for walking all over and across the street from buses that take you all around the city. Alejandro was super nice, really present with communication and made everything very easy. It was a very memorable space and made our vacation even better.

Overall, Alejandra's place is good value for money if you want a bohemian, quirky place to explore San Telmo and Puerto Madero. It is quiet, as seen in the photos, and Alejandra is a great host. I would recommend it for young travellers, not so much for older people in summer as it can be very hot in the non-AC spaces.

Positives:
+ Location - walking distance to Plaza Dorrego and everything San Telmo has to offer. Parque Lezama and La Boca are also close if you are willing to walk a bit further
+ Host - Alejandra makes an effort to help and be present, made herself available on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), which made coordination much easier. She even left a panettone (pan dulce) to welcome us when we arrived
+ Cool space - as seen in the photos!  very friendly vibe and very quiet

Negatives:
- Living room hot in summer - the space was very hot (normal in Buenos Aires) and, as described in the ad, had no AC. It was an issue for us because my in-laws could not climb the stairs to the bedroom. Alejandra kindly provided 2 fans but it was still extremely hot. This should not be an issue in winter.
- Bugs (ants, spiders) in living room and bathroom - this is pretty common in 100 year-old buildings like this one, but we had to deal with some ants and small insects in bathroom and bedroom
- Wifi signal - wifi would not connect in the bedroom with the bedroom door closed, which was slightly annoying but nothing major. Signal good in the rest of the apartment
reviews.response:
A pesar de que puedo escribir en inglés lo voy a hacer en español porque es mi lengua nativa (igual que la tuya, Alejandro) y es más auténtico. Tu comentario sorprende por su nivel de detalles y su falta de tacto.  No obstante el detalle, hubo algunas cuestiones que omitiste y que voy a mencionar usando tu estilo y clasificación. 
Entre los “positivos” 1. Pediste hacer el check-in temprano a la mañana y te concedí ese deseo para que no tuvieras que hacer tiempo con tu familia en el aeropuerto. 
2. Olvidaste un abrigo y me tomé el trabajo de avisarte "de onda".
3.Te facilité mi (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) para que me comunicaras si hubo algún inconveniente, cosa que no hiciste. 
Con respecto a los “negativos”, 
1. entiendo que el “problema” de las hormigas se hubiera solucionado fácilmente: era sólo abrir la alacena y usar alguno de los tantos insecticidas, mata moscas y repelentes de que dispone la casa, que son muchísimos.
2. Llegaste en una de las semanas más calurosas del año y no fuiste muy hábil para direccionar el frío que viene del A/C del cuarto como hace todo el mundo, una pena. 3. Determinar si el espacio era adecuado para tus suegros no es tarea mía, corre por tu cuenta, era simplemente mirar las fotos y sacar conclusiones. 
Lo que no deja de sorprenderme es que hayas sido tan poco elegante como para hacer algunos de los comentarios (totalmente solucionables) en privado, dado que es obvio que lo que vayas a escribir será visto por los demás y no suma, es dañino, pero sobre todo porque fuiste bien recibido y te abrieron la casa sin conocerte e hicieron lo indecible para que vos y los tuyos se sintieran cómodos aunque recibir extraños implique un riesgo para el propietario.  
Debo decir que mi espacio es una casa verdadera, no es un hotel, está localizado en un barrio alternativo y posee un entorno lleno de plantas, es bastante probable que en alta temporada de verano, en la cual se vienen registrando temperaturas de hasta 40° de sensación térmica, pueda llegar a haber algún insecto, pero también creo que está bien equipado y hay elementos para atenuar ese tipo de inconveniente, sólo hay que tener un poquito de buena voluntad para hacerlo. 
En fin, resumiendo, tu comentario me parece totalmente infeliz y para nada constructivo, más bien se asemeja a una puñalada por la espalda.

reviews.comments:
Infelizmente não posso deixar um comentário (URL HIDDEN) chegarmos no apto havia um forte cheiro de gás antes mesmo de abrirmos a porta do apto na varanda.Ligamos para Alejandra na hora disse que não sabia,passou uns 10 minutos ela retornou a ligação mandando ver o fogão que deveria estar aberto um dos bicos ,o que realmente estava.Nao morremos ao abrir a porta porque em cima do fogão tem um basculante do qual estava aberto por isso na varanda havia tanto cheiro de gás.
Também não era como foi colocado existia uma cama de casal do qual o colchão era almofadas.Devido a isso e a vários outros problemas ,chegamos por volta das zero hora do dia 24/11 e às 10 horas da manhã deste mesmo dia fomos para um hotel em Palermo aonde teríamos total segurança e conforto.
reviews.response: Celeste, te aconsejo que antes de hacer una reserva primero leas correctamente los anuncios, el futón, que describiste como "cama con colchón de almohadones" aparece en la descripción del loft y te aseguro que es confortable, yo misma he dormido en él y creo que para una estancia corta es interesante. Con respecto a la demora en el check-out, fueron apenas 10 minutos y no 40 como exageradamente colocas en tu review, puede pasar, no fue por mala intención. Entiendo que la experiencia no fue la mejor pero me parece que deberías ser un poco más objetiva al escribir un comentario público, porque si hay 100 comentarios y la gran mayoría son positivos queda un poco raro algo tan pero tan negativo, suena poco creible. Te aseguro que puse mi mejor voluntad pero a veces las cosas no salen, lo lamento. Que tengas suerte en tu experiencia Airbnb.

reviews.comments: We had a nice time here. The location is very good. I would recommend the place, but it's not perfect with little kids because it has steps inside and steep stairs to the bedroom.
Alejandra est une hôte très sympathique et arrangeante. L'appart est clair, calme et bien équipé. Je recommande.

L'appartement se situe dans un quartier très animé de la ville, San Telmo. Il est calme car il donne sur une cour intérieure malgré le fait d'être sur une grande avenue.
La cuisine et la salle de bains mériteraient cependant quelques améliorations.
reviews.response: San Telmo se caracteriza por tener espacios para personas que gustan del estilo de vida alternativo y bohemio. Se trata de un estilo rústico y retro, con techos altos, bobedillas y paredes no tan regulares, que mantiene características originales de la época en la que se construyó el edificio. Ese es el espíritu de mi espacio, creo que tal vez no era exactamente lo que buscabas. Igualmente, toda sugerencia siempre es bienvenida. Muchas gracias.

reviews.comments: Alejandra was a great host. We loved being in San Telmo so close to plaza dorrego and walkable distance to plaza de Mayo. Apartment made a great home base.

Alejandra's place is super comfortable and cozy. I had a great time staying there with my parents. It's super close to Plaza Serrano in San Telmo, and to Puerto Madero, and also in walkable distance to the microcentro. Alejandra was super accessible, although we didn't have any problem during our stay. I strongly recommend the place.
Lovely apartment, which is full of character. Alejandra was very friendly and helpful. Many thanks.

The listing description was very accurate, it was a nice, cozy and quirky place to stay and hangout while resting from our adventuring throughout the city. It's on a busy street but it is very quiet once inside! Enjoyed the atmosphere.

Alejandra realy nice person. I recommend her house and her hospitality. 
House is oldish style, traditional historical, and very usefull. Very very close Dorrego platza, there is so beautiful place, about tango, culture, art and traditional food.. There's many bus stop front of house,  you arrive every neighborhood 24 hours. Don't think about slow Wi-Fi it is common problem of B. Aires..Have a nice trip.

We had a great experience. We were very impressed by the pictures and the real apartment was no disappointment. It was spacious, and it had a really nice bohemian atmosphere while still being very clean and well-functioning.  

Alejandra was very helpful. She was easy to reach and gave good advice about getting to the apartment. She changed our bed linen midway through our stay, and offered to arrange our taxi to airport.

We stayed in this beautiful apartment for a week over christmas and it was just perfect for us two tired travellers :) A quirky, comfortable, pleasant place to relax. Location was great, close to Plaza Dorrego and the markets, shops and restaurants. We had everything we needed and more - great hot showers, peace and quiet, netflix, well-equipped kitchen, strong internet, aircon, comfy bed....... and a lovely host in Alejandra who made us welcome, left cookies and answered all our questions :) Check-in and out was very smooth, we didn't want to leave! Highly recommend :)
reviews.response: Dear Celine, thank you very much for beeing such a great host. Looking forward to seeing you round again! Have a great New Year!!!!

reviews.comments:
Overall good host.Apartment as described, but i'm surprised that no one in reviews has notice that actually apartment is not so quiet.Ofcourse not noisy as street noise, but actually you will hear all sounds when neighbors opening/closing doors, walking.And offcourse in apartment is very cold, in the winter i think here is very cold(here is air condition,but anyway big holes everywhere).
But for exploring San Telmo and just sleeping few hours if perfect.
Internet was stable, but not fast.
Authentic argentinian restaurants is just 7 mins walking
reviews.response: Antes de llegar, Igor envió un mensaje solicitando una serie de requerimientos para hacer la reserva: pidió descuento, pidió que le comprara uma SIM CARD para su celular, preguntó si el colchón era duro, si había internet individual, si podía hacer un late check-out, si podía hacer un check-in nocturno. Todos y cada uno de sus requerimientos fueron concedidos. Llegó un sábado a la medianoche y fui personalmente a recibirlo para que no tuviera que quedarse en el aeropuerto, llevando la SIM CARD que había pedido, que inclusive se la regalé. Pidió si podía cambiarle dólares a cambio paralelo (40% más alto que el oficial) porque al día siguiente era feriado y no quería cambiar al valor oficial, se lo concedí. Luego pidió dos (2) veces más si podía cambiarle y cada vez tuve que ir al departamento personalmente. Siempre se dirigió a mí en un tono imperativo, ligeramente displicente y como si yo tuviera obligación de satisfacer sus pedidos, nunca se mostró agradecido. El día del check-out encontré la casa desordenada, con bastante vajilla sucia y basura, lo que no me agradó. Tratando de ser amistosa, le pregunté cómo la había pasado y me respondió con un lacónico “OK” lo que me decepcionó un poco. Su comentario me parece algo agresivo y confuso, me pregunto cómo puede decir que el departamento es “frío” cuando se hospedó en pleno verano con temperaturas rozando los 30°. Hace 6 años que soy owner en Airbnb y he hospedado gran cantidad de gente, la mayoría de la cual siempre ha tenido una actitud amistosa que trato de retribuir ayudándolos en lo que esté a mi alcance. Entiendo que a algunos les puede gustar mucho mi espacio y a otros no tanto, cada uno es libre para opinar, pero creo que hay maneras y maneras de dirigirse a alguien que notoriamente se está esforzando para hacerte la estancia agradable. La actitud de Igor para conmigo simplemente reforzó los comentarios de otros propietarios que ya lo habían hospedado, quienes afirmaron que se trata de una persona extraña. Sinceramente no lo recomiendo.

reviews.comments:
Alejandra was waiting for us when we arrived at her apartment. She helped us with some questions we had about San Telmo and other things in Argentina, which was great to get a local's advice. 
Her apartment is as shown in the photos, with quirky details that showcase its older character. 
The apartment is located on a busy road, but only a couple blocks away from 'old town' San Telmo and the main market street Defensa.
We had to leave early in the morning for a flight and Alejandra made it possible by leaving us instructions for how to return the keys. She also helped us in a big way when I left my contacts at her apartment and she promptly mailed them to our next location. Thank-you so much!

Alejandra was quick to respond and very helpful in letting us store our bags at the apartment while we went on a day trip. The apartment itself is definitely quirky, a bit basic in kitchen facilities but we made do, and the location is great - we walked everywhere from there including San Telmo, La Boca, Puerto Madero and the centre.
Great space, great location, great host!

Had a fantastic stay in mid-October when BA was just a glorious time to visit. The apartment is lovely, well-equipped and such a fantastic welcoming host. Alejandra was on hand with a warm welcome when we arrived. We really appreciated her very helpful and speedy responses to our queries. The area is teeming with things to do and see - it's a beautiful area though sadly many heritage buildings, are crying out for some care and attention. So nice to see the apartment in an old building that is looked after well and cherished. Highly recommend this for value, location and a little 'je ne sais quoi'!
Alejandra place is unique. And don't forget to visit the San Telmo market during the weekend ;-)
Très beau loft, très bien aménagé, très propre et très confortable. Il est idéalement situé. Excellent accueil de la part d'Alejandra. Nous recommandons vivement cette location.
Thank you to Alejandra for being such an amazing host. She was so helpful with suggestions for things we may enjoy during our stay and the apartment was absolutely beautiful!!
reviews.response:
Thank you, Isobel! It was a pleasure to have you in my space. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!
:-)

reviews.comments: We stayed for 5 days. The room was perfect. Was spacious, clean and quiet. Beef and wines of Argentina are the best. We were able to cook in the kitchen free. Was very good. And there are nice cafes and shops nearby. She was very kind and it was sweet. I want to go back to Buenos Aires.:-)

My stay at the loft was beautiful, Alejandra very friendly, helpful,  nice and flexible. The loft itself is beautiful, the kitchen is perfectly equipped and the situation of the loft fantastic in the San Telmo area, which is the nicest in BA.

Alajandra's place is exactly how described in the ad. We had really nice time in Buenos Aires, I would definitely use this again if back.

Muito Obrigado.
It is a very nice appartment in a good location. Alejandra was very friendly and helpfull to us.

I absolutely loved this apartment! It's an interesting specimen in the funky, fun designs of buildings in San Telmo. The space is lovely and open, great for the summer months. It's in a lovely area with plenty to do.

The loft is in a fantastic location! Great bars, restaurants, and stores close by.  The loft is a wonderful space.  Alejandra was a fantastic host. She provided great info before and during my stay.  She greeted me when I arrived and arranged a taxi when I checked out and was off to the airport.  Highly recommend the apartment!
reviews.response: Really pleased to meet you, Patricia. Looking forward to seeing you again!

reviews.comments: The stay at Alejandra's place was wonderful...the loft is exactly as showed in the pictures, quite, well located, nicely decorated and cosy. I slept very well here and felt like at home. Alexandra is very kind and nice! Thank you again for everything !

Alejandra's home is very quiet and nice ! We felt well and secure. The communication with Alejandra was easy and she's very helpful !
Great place ! Thanks you A.
THE space was really special and really big. I felt home immidiatly, i would say great experience.
reviews.response: Thank you very much, Jules. Looking forward to meet you in person next time!

reviews.comments:
The little time we spent at the apartment was great, we loved the style of the apartment, good accommodation, we had all that we needed. Although we never met Alejandra she seemed very friendly and helpful. Her friend Graciela that was there to meet us was very kind to show us around the apartment, and we were welcomed to call whenever we wanted.

San Telmo is a very good place to stay and very central. Its one of the good quarters of Buenos Aires and there is much to see. Unfortunately we never got to see everything, so I guess we'll have to get back again :-)
reviews.response: Thank you very much for your words, Marcelo! Looking forward to meeting you soon!!!

reviews.comments: O ambiente é muito bom e Alejandra foi muito atenciosa. Não precisamos de ajuda em nenhum momento de nossa estadia, tudo que precisamos estava a mão, sem dificuldades. O loft é muito bem equipado e a localização é excelente, a pouca distância de pontos turísticos e com todo  tipo de serviço no mesmo quarteirão. O bairro de San Telmo é talvez o mais bonito de Buenos Aires. Excelente.
reviews.response: Obrigada e até a próxima!!!!

reviews.comments: Highly recommended! Alejandra was a wonderful host, with tips for exploring the neighborhood, thorough information on the ins-and-outs of the loft, and a kind, easy-going personality. She was professional and prompt, and I appreciated her coordinating car service to the airport on my last day. The loft was the perfect place from which to explore San Telmo. There's also incredibly easy access to taxis and buses just outside the front door. It was quiet and comfortable, with a lot of character. I felt completely safe and secure staying there alone, but of course (as with anywhere) used common sense when it came to late nights in the surrounding area. I will for sure be staying here on my next visit. Thanks, Alejandra!
reviews.response: Thank you, Taya. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.comments:
The experience at San Telmo loft was wonderful. Alejandra is very reactive every time you need information or help. The situation of the apartment is perfect, buses just in front, and the San Telmo particular soul just behind. The apartment in itself is exactly as the images : design, very essential, poetic. I was alone but never felt insecure.
Cell phone, fixed phone and internet were perfectly working.

After spending a couple of weeks in Palermo Hollywood we moved across to San Telmo for our last two weeks in BA to get a different perspective on the city. 

San Telmo was more central and as you'd expect much older, with loads of cobblestone streets. Plenty of antique shops and a pretty good selection of restaurants too. Our favourite was the Pintxos bar just around the corner on Humberto 1st (as good as anything you'll get in San Sebastián in Spain).

I guess you'd describe the apartment as a warehouse apartment. Very cool layout and worked perfectly for us (young couple with a four month old baby). The kitchen had everything we needed to cook at home most nights. The only downside was the hot water in the bathroom was a bit temperamental, but nothing too major.

Alajandra was a great host. Easy to communicate with. She helped us sort out a taxi and was flexible with the arrival (late again). Overall we would definitely recommend the apartment and the area. 

Oh and one last thing, don't be put off by the busy road when you first arrive at the apartment building. The apartment is right at the back of the building and is super quiet. It's also only two blocks away from the famous Plaza Dorrego and there is a Carrefour Express 30 metres from the front door. So a pretty handy location.
Very nice, neat, and organized loft. The owner takes good care of it and it feels like being home.

For us, two tango ladies from Helsinki Finland, Alejandra´s loft in San Telmo was perfect. It was close to many milonga places and round the corner of Plaza Dorrego and other icons where tango argentino was born and alive. In the arrival my suitcase was lost in London and Alejandra kindly took it to her home when it finally arrived to BsAs and we were having dance classes and were not home in the loft. The loft was clean and quiet from the traffic - on the weekends, rave parties from the neighbourhood one cannot avoid but ear plugs will help. Alejandra was responsive to any questions we had and did her best to help us to feel home. Staying in the loft was like a wonderful trip on time machine, the rustic character of the apartment is elegant and awesome. Thank you Alejandra!

We spent 10 wonderful days in Alejandra s loft !
if i could have extended our stay there  i would have done it !
it fits exactly our taste , it has a soul , the space is very interesting 
it is very quiet and poetic 
i enjoyed staying at home after tango classes !
Ajejandra always responded perfectly to all kind of questions or requests!
the loft is generous and very well organized with many guide books and a beautiful anthology of poetry in Argentine!
if next year we are back to Argentine i would love to book it for a month!
highly recommended!
Thank you for very thing Alejandra!

It was really great staying at this loft. We stayed total 7nights but could have easily extended the stay because we liked it so much. Also it was great having a home for a few days. Alejandra was really helpful and answered every question quickly. Also the location is fabulous.

Fashionable loft in excellent location, well served by buses.
.Quiet, secure and very private. 
The loft was very well equipped, clean and comfortable, Alejandra was extremely helpful.
Easy access to San Telmo food market to buy fresh provisions. We would stay again.

L appartement d Alexandra est très bien situé, calme et joliment décoré, de plus Alexandra est une personne charmante! Je recommande  vivement cette location! Antoine et Dominique Faure séjour à Buenos Aires du 4 au 10 janvier 2014

The loft in San Telmo is exactly as the pictures show - a quirky apartment in an amazing old building. Alejandra is an exceptional host - great communication before and during the stay. She also went out offer way to wait for us on arrival. We were there over New Year - with BA in the midst of an unusual heat wave. The air con in the bedroom was a life saver (if only the mosquitoes would have stayed away). As a base in this older part of town, the loft is ideal.

Alejandra's place was awesome. It is a quiet and peaceful sanctuary in the middle of bustling Buenos Aires.

She was very accommodating and even provided a mobile in case I needed to reach her while I was in town. 

I will definitely look for her place the next time I am in town!

We stayed one month in San Telmo and really enjoyed to loft and the conversation with you as our host a lot! Thanks, Alejandra, for being so nice and available for us! Hope to see you around (Berlin or Buenos Aires next year). Of course I would choose the loft again if I came back! Absolutely great place and atmosphere!

Excellent location near Plaza Dorego, public transport, parks, cafes, restaurants.

The apartment is tidy and clean with a good style that is true to Buenos Aires.

Alejandra was wonderful on arrival. MY flight was very late yet she waited for me to arrive. THANKYOU.

I will definitely stay here again.

The flat was as nice as it is on the picture and it was a pleasure living in it. The only true downside is the water heater that sometimes turns off when you take a shower and the water becomes very cold, but that's a vintage flat !

It's well located, really easy to access by cab, bus or subway. Alejandra was a great host and very helpful. Unfortunately for us, the wifi didn't work in the building during our stay but being in holiday, we made do happily, and had a lovely stay.

I spent ten days in Buenos Aires this fall, and it was magical - in no small part because of Alejandra and her beautiful, magically-cool, perfectly-located loft.  It is very San Telmo-esque, right in San Telmo neighborhood, but inside a wonderful old building, so there's almost never any noise from the neighborhood at all.  The loft, just like the neighborhood, is *made* of bohemian character.  But the important practical things are all wonderful, too - I was amazed how warm I was in such a big space, in an old building.  (Especially up in the bedroom!)  There was always tons of hot water, and it was very convenient to have both a landline and a cell phone to use for local calls.  The loft is just a few doors down from a Carrefour Express, for coffee, bread, snacks, wine, or dinner if you want to cook - the kitchen is very well-equipped.  (I also needed toothpaste and soap...)  And right around the corner, just two blocks away, is Plaza Dorrego, the center of San Telmo neighborhood, with Defensa, its restaurants and shops and parillas and cafes, and of course the Sunday street market.  (A very beloved "real" parrilla, El Desnivel, is very close-by, and I bought a beautiful hand-painted dress to wear to the National Ballet of Uruguay at the Teatro Colon from a little boutique in the neighborhood).  

The location really is wonderful - first, you have to understand that San Telmo is one of the oldest neighborhoods in BsAs, so the cobbled streets and colonial buildings have a lot of character.  It also feels more like a neighborhood to me than the skyrise apartments of Recoleta, for example.  But it's safe - completely safe - day and night.  (I mean, it's still a big city, so take the care you would in any big city, but I was a woman traveling solo, and I felt fine in the neighborhood at all hours - there are people around until at least 3am, which is when I came home from tango one night.)
The neighborhood and the loft are also very central, so walkable to Caminito/La Boca, Puerto Madera, Plaza de Mayo, Congreso, etc.  Recoleta is a little bit of a longer walk, but I had beautiful weather, so it didn't matter to me.  But if you don't want to walk, taxies are frequent and inexpensive, and the Subte and bus lines are right on Alejandra's street.  Very, very easy to get around.  Also, Alejandra kindly left a set of recommendations and instructions, and she was very easy to contact and communicate with if ever I needed anything during my stay.  She's a kind, generous, funny, super-interesting person and a wonderful hostess.  When I come back (and I will!) I refuse to stay anywhere else!

Alejandra is a very special person who has a knack to make guests feel welcome. The apartment felt like home to us, especially after our suitcases were lost in Sao Paulo. 
The location, a block from all of the action in San Telmo is magnificent. Pase Colon has great public transportation, Bus 130 and 152. For three pesos, you can tour the city.
Don't miss the Sunday antique market in San Telmo, Tango nightly, outdoors and free.

Excellent apartment - top location in San Telmo.  It was QUIET!!!  which isnt easy to find.  Beautiful building, secure, and everything you see in the photos is exactly as you will find it.  Wifi worked perfectly.

Alejandra was an excellent host - she met me, arranged taxis, followed my flights online and responded immediately using (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and email to any messages i left for her regarding my stay both before, during and since the trip.

Its a spacious apartment - open plan - mezzanines for beds.  I didnt have any issues with it.  

Would definately recommend and stay there again!!  

Mandy - Wgtn, NZ
reviews.response: Thank you, Kate! Looking forward to seeing you soon! ;-)

reviews.comments:
Excellent
We spent 6 weeks in this apartment and enjoyed every second of it. It is perfectly placed in the back of the building so not a whole lot of noise at night. It also has a small balcony, even thou placed into the backyard we liked it. Since we were there at wintertime the weather was cold but the apartment was easily to keep warm. 
We also liked how it was sectioned and decorated with the furniture. 

the location was perfect, close to the marked i San Telmo and a good starting point for our daily excursions around the beautiful city of Buenos Aires.

Alejandra the host, was always helpful whit every little thing we wondered about and responded quickly to our questions. Her advice also made our stay richer. So big Thank you Alejandra!

We look forward to our next visit and hope to stay here again
reviews.response: Thank you for choosing the loft, Anna-Julia! Great pleasure to meet you.

reviews.comments: This apartment was extremely well-appointed and we really appreciate all the little things Alejandra left us inclduding a converter, travel guides, and as a local cell phone for which we only had to purchase minutes. The neighborhood is lovely, with San Telmo market on Sundays being a major highlight. We easily found taxis there and walked to metro at Plaza Mayor and Microcenter where we could catch the metro. Also lots of buses steps from the apt., and we discovered after a few days its easy to refill your bus card at the little shop just below the apt. Several small grocery stores are on the same block so we really made use of the kitchen, which had everything we needed. The only improvement needed is repair of the callbox, as someone outside is able to ring up but whoever in the apartment cannot be heard by the person downstairs, which proved challenging on several occasions. Overall we really enjoyed our stay and happily recommend it to others looking for a home-away-from home in BA!

O loft é lindo, do jeitinho que está nas fotos. Alejandra foi super receptiva!!!  Muito confortável, tem aquecedor que deixa tudo sempre bem quentinho. E uma banheira que "salva a vida" dos turistas que caminham muito por Buenos Aires.  ;)

Próximo ao loft fica Porto Madero, feira e mercado de San Telmo (para quem ama antiguidades), Mafalda e um Starbucks que salvou nossos cafés da manhã. (: 

Apenas sugiro tomar cuidado nas redondezas, principalmente durante a noite. O metrô fica distante do loft, então se for utilizá-lo, melhor que seja durante o dia, antes de anoitecer. Taxi é super barato, mas sugiro selecionar bem, buscar os mais "ajeitadinhos"  e novos. 
No mais, o loft é lindo e aconchegante! (:

The San Telmo Loft was a genuine experience. Really reflective of the neighborhood and it's people and you can walk to many places from here and enjoy a truly BA time.  It's a few blocks away from the modern part of the city and smack center in the middle of BA history and charm. And Alejandra is very kind and attentive! Thanks.

Alejandra is as sweet and special as her amazing apartment. We loved staying in this neighborhood. We felt that not only was it a great starting point for our daytime adventures but also a safe place to come home to later in the night. I highly recommend this apartment to anyone that wants to live among locals in style.

We loved the location, the apartment felt big, wifi and cable worked great, the kitchen had the basic utensils, Alejandra was punctual and easy to communicate with. The only flaw was that there were Mosquitos at night (buy bug repellent).
reviews.response: Jessica, thank you very much for your feedback, I'm so glad you had a good stay in the loft. Regarding mosquitoes, there are many in the city in summer, has to do with the high temperatures. Anticipating this, in the kitchen cupboard of the house we have spirals and repellent lotion to easily solve this minor issue. Maybe you did not noticed them. Thanks again and until next time!

reviews.comments: A estadia foi maravilhosa. Alejandra é uma pessoa fina e presente. O espaço é agradável e localizado num dos bairros mais charmosos de Buenos Aires. Pretendo repetir a experiência. Manoel Bione

This is an extraordinary place located a few steps from the charming centre of old San Telmo and Alejandra is your perfect host. I stayed with my friend Oliver for one week in March 2013 in this spacious, clean, amazingly quiet and very tastefully decorated loft apartment. The place has everything to make yourself feel at home including a well equipped kitchen, a cosy living-room area, a comfortable bed and a nice bathroom. Alejandra is very hospitable and helpful, she provides you with an impressive collection of guide books and maps on Buenos Aires or Argentina and there is also a cell phone and landline phone available. I highly recommend this place.

This spacious and genuine furnished apartment is ideally located in San Telmo, not far from Puerto Madero (check out Reserva ecológica, an urban oasis offering relaxing an calm excursions after a busy sight seeing) and just steps from plaza Dorrego and the Feria de San Telmo. Also the entry to the building is on Av. Paseo Colon, it is very calm inside and you are in no way mostested by its traffic. 

Si vous aimeriez passer vos vacances dans un endroit très calme mais très proche de Plaza Dorrego, dans la vieille ville, louez ce joli et spacieux appartement au coeur de San Telmo!

Alejandra ist freundlich und zuvorkommend und kümmert sich gut um ihre Gäste. In der Wohung ist es unglaublich ruhig, obwohl der Eingang an der Av. Paseo Colon gelegen ist, nur wenige Minuten vom Plaza Dorrego entfernt, Sie ist gut und authentisch eingerichtet und bietet eine schöne Athmosphäre inmitten von San Telmo.

I very much enjoyed staying in this attractive apartment which is so conveniently placed for exploring the San Telmo district of Buenos Aires.  Alejandra was very welcoming in her correspondence and the flat had useful leaflets and maps as a guide to the city.
I loved the retro furniture and layout of this loft and was struck by how quiet and peaceful it was.  I am happy to recommend it to others.
Kate

Me and my husband stayed here for a week in February and loved it. The apartment is amazing - everything is antique and stylish but comfortable. The old wrought iron elevator is amazing. The apartment is spacious and airy and has everything you need to make yourself at home - full kitchen, coffeemaker, etc. The bedroom is in a small loft and is very cozy. We took many a siesta there with one of the antique fans cooling us down. It's location is great - San Telmo is a very cool neighborhood, not as wealthy as the other neighborhoods further north but with a lot of character and wonderful restaurants and shops. 
Alejandra was extremely helpful and responsive from start to finish. She explained everything and was available to answer our questions at all times.
I would definitely recommend the apartment and would stay here again.

Alajandra's flat and hospitality was the perfect start to Johanne and I's trip around the globe. The flat was perfect for lounging around, working, sleeping, and entertaining some locals thanks to its well maintained kitchen. San Telmo offered a perfect mix of history and fun with cabs frequently available out front to experience the rest of the city.

The loft was great - it´s clean, comfortable, well located and absolutely everything was provided for.

Alejandra herself was extremely helpful and provided us with all the information we needed for our stay in BA.

Thanks Alejandra!

Alejandra was a great host. She was extremely organized and had tons of guide books and maps for our use, as well as a guide to the neighborhood with everything you'd ever need from grocery stores to laundry places. The place is very adorable, and while it's on a busy street, once you get into the apartment, it's very quiet and lovely. There's a full kitchen with everything you'd need. Having a cell phone was a huge bonus and extremely helpful! Highly recommend!

Exactly what is says on the tin, well located, with the bohemian look typical in San Telmo. It has everything I needed for my week in Bs As and the fact I didn't need to call Alejandra is always positive.

She was very attentive anyway and as whole , a good experience

The apartment was exactly what I'd hoped for -- old and charming, walkable to the subway, just off of the main streets of San Telmo. Alejandra was very warm and considerate. I was touched when she called a cab for me to go to the airport and then kept me company while I waited.

I came to BA by myself and felt totally safe and comfortable in this apartment and this part of the city. This is a great, central location from which to explore.
